DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine clinical feasibility efficacy uing IMRT escalate biologically effective dose pelvic lymph node short course radiation therapy . An increased total biologically effective dose deliver pelvic lymph node ( 56 Gy 2 Gy/fraction ) . The prostate receive standard `` short course '' IMRT radiation ( 70 Gy 2.5 Gy/fraction ) .
DOC.brief_title: Intensity Modulated Radiation Therapy ( IMRT ) Radiotherapy Treating Prostate Pelvic Nodes
DOC.criteria: Prostate cancer stage TT3 Predicted risk lymph node involvement > 15 % Gleason > 7 Distance metastasis Use anticoagulant therapy
